description: This file defines the UtilityAccountMapper class, which provides methods to convert between UtilityAccount DTOs and UtilityAccountEntity entities, using Spring's BeanUtils for copying properties.

classes.name: UtilityAccountMapper
classes.description: A class that maps between UtilityAccount entity and DTO, extending BaseMapper.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a UtilityAccount DTO to UtilityAccountEntity, copying properties if DTO is not null.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a UtilityAccountEntity to UtilityAccount DTO, copying properties if entity is not null.
